qas.question: Where did Chopin stay while in London?
What company provided Chopin with a piano while in London?
What two notable guests were present during his premiere performance at Stafford House?
What date did he perform with Viardot?
What steet did Chopin stay on in London?
What did Broadway provide for Chopin?
What two dignitaries where at his first performance in London?
In addition to hearing him play, what else did people seek from Chopin in London?
Who sang chopin arrangements on July 7 of the year Chopin was in London?

context: In London Chopin took lodgings at <a0_0><a5_0>Dover Street<a5_0/><a0_0/>, where the firm of <a1_0>Broadwood<a1_0/> provided him with <a6_0>a grand piano.<a6_0/> At his first engagement, on 15 May at <a2_0>Stafford House<a2_0/>, the audience included <a3_0><a7_0>Queen Victoria and Prince Albert<a3_0/>.<a7_0/> The Prince, who was himself a talented musician, moved close to the keyboard to view Chopin's technique. Broadwood also arranged concerts for him; among those attending were Thackeray and the singer Jenny Lind. Chopin was also sought after for <a8_0>piano lessons<a8_0/>, for which he charged the high fee of one guinea (£1.05 in present British currency) per hour, and for private recitals for which the fee was 20 guineas. At a concert on <a4_0>7 July<a4_0/> he shared the platform with <a9_0>Viardot<a9_0/>, who sang arrangements of some of his mazurkas to Spanish texts.
